data.title: Outer Banks Pool Company
data.text:
Clark Pool Group builds pools, patios, decks, outdoor kitchens. If you need siding, windows or remodeling, Clark Pool Group can do it all.

We are the factory, so you can expect a reasonable time for your pool to be installed. No worries about stalled supply lines and waiting a year for other types of pools you might be considering.

WHEN BUILDING ON THE OUTER BANKS OR THE MAINLAND, A CONCRETE POOL IS YOUR BEST OPTION.

The Outer Banks, Currituck County and Northeast North Carolina have a high water table. If you are on the oceanfront, soundfront or anywhere in a flood zone (AE, VE ), then for peace of mind, the only solution is a concrete pool designed and built by Clark Pool Group.
